title: Create Service List Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying a list of services with filtering, sorting, and pagination capabilities

user_stories: As a customer, I need to browse services by category so that I can find what I need
As a service provider, I want to view a list of my services so that I can manage them
business_rules: Service list must display key service information with pagination
Service list must support filtering by category and sorting
Service list must follow the design system
Service list must handle loading states and error messages
edge_cases: Handling empty service lists and loading states
Managing large service lists with pagination
Processing filter and sort operations efficiently
Displaying service information with proper categorization

acceptance_criteria: Service list component displays services with pagination and filtering
Service list component supports sorting by different fields
Service list component follows the design system
Service list component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Service list component integrates with Service Management API endpoints

endpoints.description: Get all services with optional filtering and pagination

integration_tests: Service list integration with backend APIs
Filtering and sorting with API parameters

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement service list component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with service management API. Implement efficient filtering and sorting.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for service list access. Implement appropriate privacy controls for service information display.
